snippet: Two more sponsors of the United States Olympic team condemned the law, but leading global sponsors did not join them.
abstract: Protesters around the world pressure Olympic sponsors to speak out explicitly against Russia's law restricting gay-rights activities; AT&T was first to speak out, but leading global sponsors have not yet joined in.
lead_paragraph: Two more sponsors of the United States Olympic team condemned the law, but leading global sponsors did not join them.

headline.main: Gay-Rights Advocates Target Sponsors Over Law
headline.print_headline: Gay-Rights Advocates Target Sponsors Over Law
